summary:
Comfy animated loading screen.
In 4 variants, light brown, gray and black.
Sample video inside!
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/S2B3bAV.png[/img]ï»¿
Simple and super comfy animated loading screens.
[color=#f9cb9c][b]Light Brown[/b][/color], [color=#666666][b]Gray[/b][/color] or [b][color=#000000]Black[/color] [/b][color=#f4f4f4]backgrounds.[/color]
[color=#ffff00][size=3][b]Manual install[/b][/size][/color], drop the selected variant into Data/Interface.
Video Sample:
